{"name": "Old Tappan Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Enjoy a social lunch with friends every 2nd and 4th Thursday of every month.
Where: Aurora, 203 Old Tappan rd

Old Tappan residents only 
They need to register for the social services by the director in order to get food", "email": "", "url": "http://www.oldtappan.net/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "227 Old Tappan Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Old Tappan", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07675", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.0127983, "longitude": -73.98387530000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 664-1849", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
